name: TularemiaTestsForFrancisellaTularensisByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Tularemia (Tests for Francisella tularensis by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Francisella tularensis organism),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Francisella tularensis culture or isolate

LOINC search: Francisella tularensis (isolate or culture)),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
